title: ‘Long on talk and short on action’: Papua New Guinea leader criticises Cop climate summits ahead of Brazil meeting
summary: James Marape, previously absent from last year's meeting in protest, is set to attend COP30 due to positive developments regarding climate finance. His decision reflects a shift in outlook on global financial support for climate initiatives. The change indicates growing optimism about international cooperation on environmental issues.

title: Trump administration ‘failed to consider the harms’ in not supporting Snap, judge says in ruling that demands funds by Friday –as it happened
summary: The live blog has concluded. No further updates or information will be provided. Thank you for following along.

title: Trump news at a glance: administration reduces US flights as shutdown stretches on
summary: Experts forecast that hundreds, potentially thousands, of flights may be canceled across numerous major airports. This disruption is expected to affect travel plans significantly. Travelers are advised to stay informed about their flight status and plan accordingly.

title: Ukraine war briefing: Ukrainian court jails Russian soldier for killing PoW in landmark sentence
summary: A soldier has become the first to be sentenced to prison for killing a Ukrainian soldier who had surrendered in the Zaporizhzhia region. This marks a notable legal development amid the ongoing conflict. The incident occurred on day 1,353 of the war.
